name: squared
description: Virtual DOM and CSS framework for parsing usable browser data.

scripts.install-chrome: npm i @babel/core --save-dev && npm i @babel/preset-env --save-dev && npm i terser@4.8.0 --save-dev && npm i prettier --save-dev && npm i clean-css --save-dev && npm i html-minifier-terser --save-dev && npm i uglify-js --save-dev
scripts.bundles: node bundle.js -f base -o ./dist/bundles/squared.base.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f base -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.base.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android+widget.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android+widget.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -o ./dist/bundles/squared.chrome.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.chrome.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -o ./dist/bundles/squared.vdom.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.vdom.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f vdom-lite -o ./dist/bundles/squared.vdom-lite.bundle.$npm_package_version.js
scripts.bundles-win: node bundle.js -f base -o ./dist/bundles/squared.base.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f base -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.base.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android+widget.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android+widget.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -o ./dist/bundles/squared.chrome.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.chrome.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -o ./dist/bundles/squared.vdom.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.vdom.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f vdom-lite -o ./dist/bundles/squared.vdom-lite.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js
scripts.md5-check: npm run md5-chromium && npm run md5-chromium-diff
scripts.md5-chromium: rimraf temp/chromium/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium -f 1
scripts.md5-chromium-raw: rimraf temp/chromium-raw/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium-raw -f 2 -t 300
scripts.md5-chromium-svg: rimraf temp/chromium-svg/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium-svg -f 4
scripts.md5-chromium-all-diff: npm run md5-chromium && npm run md5-chromium-raw && npm run md5-chromium-svg && npm run md5-chromium-diff && npm run md5-chromium-raw-diff && npm run md5-chromium-svg-diff
scripts.md5-chromium-all-rebase: node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/chromium/master ./temp/chromium && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/chromium/master-raw ./temp/chromium-raw && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/chromium/master-svg ./temp/chromium-svg
scripts.md5-firefox: rimraf temp/firefox/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b firefox -o ./temp/firefox -f 1
scripts.md5-firefox-raw: rimraf temp/firefox-raw/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b firefox -o ./temp/firefox-raw -f 2 -t 300
scripts.md5-firefox-svg: rimraf temp/firefox-svg/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b firefox -o ./temp/firefox-svg -f 4
scripts.md5-firefox-all-diff: npm run md5-firefox && npm run md5-firefox-raw && npm run md5-firefox-svg && npm run md5-firefox-diff && npm run md5-firefox-raw-diff && npm run md5-firefox-svg-diff
scripts.md5-firefox-all-rebase: node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/firefox/master ./temp/firefox && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/firefox/master-raw ./temp/firefox-raw && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/firefox/master-svg ./temp/firefox-svg
scripts.md5-webkit: rimraf temp/webkit/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b webkit -o ./temp/webkit -f 1
scripts.md5-webkit-raw: rimraf temp/webkit-raw/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b webkit -o ./temp/webkit-raw -f 2 -t 300
scripts.md5-webkit-svg: rimraf temp/webkit-svg/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b webkit -o ./temp/webkit-svg -f 4
scripts.md5-webkit-all-diff: npm run md5-webkit && npm run md5-webkit-raw && npm run md5-webkit-svg && npm run md5-webkit-diff && npm run md5-webkit-raw-diff && npm run md5-webkit-svg-diff
scripts.md5-webkit-all-rebase: node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/webkit/master ./temp/webkit && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/webkit/master-raw ./temp/webkit-raw && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/webkit/master-svg ./temp/webkit-svg
scripts.dev: tsc -p ./config/tsconfig.dev.json && rollup -c ./config/rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c ./framework/android/rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c ./framework/chrome/rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c ./framework/vdom/rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c ./framework/vdom-lite/rollup.config.dev.js && npm run dev-express
scripts.prod: npm run clean && eslint **/*.ts && tsc -p ./config/tsconfig.prod.json && rollup -c ./config/rollup.config.js && rollup -c ./framework/android/rollup.config.js && rollup -c ./framework/chrome/rollup.config.js && rollup -c ./framework/vdom/rollup.config.js && rollup -c ./framework/vdom-lite/rollup.config.js && npm run prod-express
scripts.prod-all: npm run prod && npm run prod-android-extension && npm run prod-express && npm run prod-scripts && npm run bundles
scripts.prod-win: npm run prod && npm run prod-android-extension && npm run prod-express && npm run prod-scripts && npm run bundles-win
scripts.clean: rimraf build/* && rimraf dist/* && rimraf temp/*
